channel.title: Client Background
channel.description:
Anyone know how to get it animated ?
ive gotten it multiple pictures going in order, but its not smooth , is there any way to add a animated background, like runescape ? im kinda stuck on this .
if ive made myself unclear please tell me.

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:6, topic:337319”][quote author=Frell link=topic=433723.msg3184760#msg3184760 date=1271619446]
Does the client support .gif?
[/quote]
yes, thats what i used to display multiple pictures but its not smooth, i can show in few mins.[/quote]
That depends on the framerate of the .gif itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Frell:

Does the client support .gif?

yes, thats what i used to display multiple pictures but its not smooth, i can show in few mins.[quote=“hippo429, post:5, topic:337319”]ohh animation not actual pictures mixing together… thats easy… just open up the background take out bucket tolerence at 64 hit white then take a dif photo use magic want to copy coulors and then take the line tool and make short lines for your out line and then bucket diferent shades.[/quote]
wtf…

Read full topic

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

ohh animation not actual pictures mixing together… thats easy… just open up the background take out bucket tolerence at 64 hit white then take a dif photo use magic want to copy coulors and then take the line tool and make short lines for your out line and then bucket diferent shades.

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

well this isnt really server help but… since im specialized in advanced graphics i might be able to help you.

example if you took your background and made it all black then took your pictures and sprayed the edges with black (use spray tool) it will look more smooth. if there is any trouble PM me

Read full topic
